head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths AXELROD, BERNARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths AXELROD, BERNARD J.

block.p: AXELROD-Bernard J.Of Larchmont, NY, on September 7, 2000. Born, April 11, 1909, New York City, graduated Columbia College and Columbia Law School. Engaged in private law practice, trustee of Bard College, active in the Alumni Association of Columbia University and in the affairs of the Village of Larchmont and on the board of the Empire State Foundation. Beloved husband of the late Rita Teitelbaum, father of Peter, Nancy and Jane, grandfather of Lisa, Brenda, Roland, Helena and great-grandfather of Connor. Funeral Services at the Larchmont Temple, Sunday, at 1 PM.
